00001 #include "sparseQR.h"
00002 
00003 SEXP sparseQR_validate(SEXP x)
00004 {
00005     CSP V = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(x, install("V"))),
00006         R = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(x, install("R")));
00007     SEXP beta = GET_SLOT(x, install("beta")),
00008         p = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_pSym),
00009         q = GET_SLOT(x, install("q"));
00010     int lq = LENGTH(q);
00011     R_CheckStack();
00012 
00013     if (LENGTH(p) != V->m)
00014         return mkString(_("length(p) must match nrow(V)"));
00015     if (LENGTH(beta) != V->m)
00016         return mkString(_("length(beta) must match nrow(V)"));
00017     if (lq && lq != R->n)
00018         return mkString(_("length(q) must be zero or ncol(R)"));
00019     if (V->n != R->n)
00020         return mkString(_("ncol(V) != ncol(R)"));
00021     /* FIXME: Check that the permutations are permutations */
00022     return ScalarLogical(1);
00023 }
00024 
00036 static
00037 void sparseQR_Qmult(cs *V, double *beta, int *p, int trans,
00038                     double *y, int *ydims)
00039 {
00040     int j, k, m = V->m, n = V->n;
00041     double *x = Alloca(m, double);      /* workspace */
00042     R_CheckStack();
00043 
00044     if (ydims[0] != m)
00045         error(_("Dimensions of system are inconsistent"));
00046     for (j = 0; j < ydims[1]; j++) {
00047         double *yj = y + j * m;
00048         if (trans) {
00049             cs_pvec(p, yj, x, m);       /* x(0:m-1) = y(p(0:m-1, j)) */
00050             Memcpy(yj, x, m);   /* replace it */
00051             for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)   /* apply H[1]...H[n] */
00052                 cs_happly(V, k, beta[k], yj);
00053         } else {
00054             for (k = n - 1 ; k >= 0 ; k--) /* apply H[n]...H[1] */
00055                 cs_happly(V, k, beta[k], yj);
00056             cs_ipvec(p, yj, x, m); /* inverse permutation */
00057             Memcpy(yj, x, m);
00058         }
00059     }
00060 }

00063 SEXP sparseQR_qty(SEXP qr, SEXP y, SEXP trans)
00064 {
00065     SEXP ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(y));
00066     CSP V = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(qr, install("V")));
00067     R_CheckStack();
00068 
00069     sparseQR_Qmult(V, REAL(GET_SLOT(qr, install("beta"))),
00070                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(qr, Matrix_pSym)),
00071                    asLogical(trans),
00072                    REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)),
00073                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym)));
00074     UNPROTECT(1);
00075     return ans;
00076 }
00077 
00078 SEXP sparseQR_coef(SEXP qr, SEXP y)
00079 {
00080     SEXP ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(y)),
00081         qslot = GET_SLOT(qr, install("q"));
00082     CSP V = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(qr, install("V"))),
00083         R = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(qr, install("R")));
00084     int *ydims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym)),
00085         *q = INTEGER(qslot),
00086         j, lq = LENGTH(qslot), m = R->m, n = R->n;
00087     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)),
00088         *x = Alloca(m, double);
00089     R_CheckStack();
00090     R_CheckStack();
00091 
00092     /* apply row permutation and multiply by Q' */
00093     sparseQR_Qmult(V, REAL(GET_SLOT(qr, install("beta"))),
00094                    INTEGER(GET_SLOT(qr, Matrix_pSym)), 1,
00095                    REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)), ydims);
00096     for (j = 0; j < ydims[1]; j++) {
00097         double *aj = ax + j * m;
00098         cs_usolve(R, aj);
00099         if (lq) {
00100             cs_ipvec(q, aj, x, n);
00101             Memcpy(aj, x, n);
00102         }
00103     }
00104     UNPROTECT(1);
00105     return ans;
00106 }
00107 
00108 SEXP sparseQR_resid_fitted(SEXP qr, SEXP y, SEXP resid)
00109 {
00110     SEXP ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(y));
00111     CSP V = AS_CSP(GET_SLOT(qr, install("V")));
00112     int *ydims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym)),
00113         *p = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(qr, Matrix_pSym)),
00114         i, j, m = V->m, n = V->n, res = asLogical(resid);
00115     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym)),
00116         *beta = REAL(GET_SLOT(qr, install("beta")));
00117     R_CheckStack();
00118 
00119     /* apply row permutation and multiply by Q' */
00120     sparseQR_Qmult(V, beta, p, 1, ax, ydims);
00121     for (j = 0; j < ydims[1]; j++) {
00122         if (res)                /* zero first n rows */
00123             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) ax[i + j * m] = 0;
00124         else                    /* zero last m - n rows */
00125             for (i = n; i < m; i++) ax[i + j * m] = 0;
00126     }
00127     /* multiply by Q and apply inverse row permutation */
00128     sparseQR_Qmult(V, beta, p, 0, ax, ydims);
00129 
00130     UNPROTECT(1);
00131     return ans;
00132 }
